title: Nova draws the line on Jin Wei's role
desc: PETALING JAYA: There will be no more experimental forays for Goh Jin Wei. Her coach Nova Armada has issued a firm reminder for the shuttler to focus solely on her main discipline, the women's singles, especially now that she is beginning to show signs of progress.

title: How To Watch On TV & Streaming
desc: The 2026 BAFTA Film Awards will air on BBC One on Sunday, February 22. E! will broadcast in North America at 8pm ET.

title: Mourinho praises goalscorer Bah for amazing comeback after more than a year on sidelines
desc: The Danish international Alexander Bah made his comeback on Saturday, stepping onto the field a year and 13 days after suffering a serious injury while playing for Benfica, in the home match against AFS in Liga Portugal.

title: Reform predicts Tory wipeout in London
desc: Farage’s party expected to win six councils in the capital in local elections

title: South Korea protests Japanese event over disputed islands
desc: Calls Japan to drop what it described as groundless claims and to face history with humility

title: Israeli members of Trump’s Board of Peace vow Hamas will disarm 'one way or another'
desc: The plan ties Gaza’s reconstruction and billions in pledged funding to full demilitarization, with a staged weapons handover, financial incentives and a proposed international stabilization force set to deploy at Rafah

title: DHS suspends trusted-traveler programs TSA PreCheck and Global Entry as partial shutdown drags on
desc: The Department of Homeland Security is temporarily halting TSA PreCheck and Global Entry, two of the most widely used trusted-traveler programs in the United States, amid a partial government shutdown.

title: Built on trust: How Etiqa sets the standard for stability and global collaboration
desc: ETIQA, a leading provider of group medical and insurance solutions in the Philippines, continues to strengthen market trust through financial credibility, operational excellence and strategic global partnerships – guided by its purpose of making the world a better place through responsible and reliable protection.

title: Vice President Jane Opoku-Agyemang's dance courts reactions from Abronye
desc: The Bono Regional Chairman of the New Patriotic Party (NPP), Kwame Baffoe, popularly known as Abronye DC, has reacted to Vice President Professor Jane Naana Opoku-Agyemang's viral video showing her dancing at the Jubilee House.
